Trade/Device Name(s): FORA G30a Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA G30a Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a device for measuring glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites to aid in diabetes management at home or by healthcare professionals; not for diabetes diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates
